name: suavely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a man's behaviour) in a way that is polite, pleasant, and usually attractive, but often slightly false: The Frenchman smiled suavely. Tom is suavely self-assured. See
suave
More examplesFewer examples"My pleasure," he murmured suavely.He is suavely good-looking, with thick, black hair.Carter is like a diplomat switching suavely from one language to another.
